author: barnabasbusa
content: Heads up to all client teams; Starting from dencun-devnet-9 we will be starting from Capella at epoch 0. Please make sure your client is able to handle genesis time == shanghai time, and capella_fork_epoch = 0.

author: parithosh
content:
Current status:
Devnet-7: Live now, some issues we're still figuring out. Use for testing 4844/blob related tooling
Devnet-8: Specs out, release date unknown
Devnet-9: No specs out yet, But we will move to Capella genesis

author: terence0083
content: Should we aim builder override for devnet8? https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/425

author: m.kalinin
content: I'd say yes! But let's ~~discuss~~ confirm on the call

author: parithosh
content: I'd also lean towards yes even if it leads to a later devnet. Devnet-7 is stable-ish for anyone in the blob-sphere to do their testing, so we can push fixes on devnet-7 as long as we want (at the cost of client teams maintaining their forks of course).

author: m.kalinin
content: This flag is a tiny change on EL which doesn't require any heuristics implementation at the beginning, especially, for devnets. Enabling it sooner allows early adoption by CL clients

author: tbenr
content: We already have a PR ready to be merged

author: jtraglia
content: Dang. I made the classic mistake of using `DENEB_FORK_VERSION` instead of `GENESIS_FORK_VERSION`.

author: barnabasbusa
content: planning to make another deposit? If so, could you pls verify if the new one will land correctly? Otherwise I can look into making some deposits myself.

author: jtraglia
content: Yes, I plan to re-send the correct deposits. I will do it tomorrow.
